sentences.english: Take time to dream; it will take you to the stars.
sentences.chinese: 花点时间梦想，它给你九天揽月之志。

sentences.english: In youth, we clothe ourselves with rainbows, and go as brave as the zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 青春年华，能把彩虹作衣，敢上九天揽月。
